forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle sun begins to stretch across the skyline, illuminating the city with a warm glow. The forecast promises a delightful high of 67, inviting opportunities for a leisurely morning walk or a coffee at a local café. The air, filled with a soft breeze from the west, whispers through the streets, making it a pleasant time to step outside and relish the clarity of the day. 

Tonight, the sky will shift toward a peaceful evening, with clear skies and a mild low around 57. The winds will remain, creating ideal conditions for an evening stroll along the waterfront or perhaps enjoying the sunset against the iconic backdrop of the Golden Gate Bridge. Dress comfortably, perhaps in layers; a light jacket would serve you well as the day transitions into night. With marine influences always in the vicinity, remain watchful of any lingering fog or marine layer that may delicately blanket the bay by nightfall. Today is tranquil, a perfect canvas for those seeking simple joys amidst the bustling energy of the city.
